Package BANG

Class Base_Die

  • java.lang.Object
    • BANG.Base_Die
  • public class Base_Die
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used for anyone rolling a basic white die
    Author:
    Zach Carrillo

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      java.lang.Boolean canReroll
      this Boolean says if the die can be rerolled
      int face
      this int stores what face the die rolled on
      java.lang.String[] faces
      This String holds what each face is of the die
      int timesRolled
      this int stores how many times the die has been rolled

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Base_Die()  

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void checkFace()
      This method checks what face was rolled and does anny other corresponding actions
      void removeAction()
      This method decrements values in the PlayerActions array if the die had been rerolled or used
      void resetDie()
      This method resets the canReroll and timesRolled variables
      void roll()
      This method rolls the die and sets the canReroll Boolean to false if dynamite is rolled or if the die has been rolled 3 times
      void setCanReroll​(java.lang.Boolean b)
      This method sets the canReroll Boolean to b

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
